snippet: A section of Sir John Soane’s Museum will open to the public for the first time in 160 years along with an exhibition of new postcard artworks provided by the likes of Manolo Blahnik and Paul Smith.
abstract: A section of Sir John Soane’s Museum will open to the public for the first time in 160 years along with an exhibition of new postcard artworks provided by the likes of Manolo Blahnik and Paul Smith.

headline.main: In London, Creative Types Celebrate an Old Architect’s Restored Apartment
